amendment.description: To clarify the application of the gift rule to lobbyists.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2962 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 80.
Amendment SA 2962 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S2493-2498; text: CR S2493) To clarify the application of the gift rule to lobbyists.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2962 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 80.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2962 proposed by Senator Feingold.
